meanings.definition: Not flammable; not easily set on fire.
meanings.sent1: The blanket was made of noninflammable material, so it didn't catch fire easily.
meanings.sent2: It's important to use noninflammable materials in buildings to prevent fires.
meanings.sent3: The noninflammable curtains refused to participate in the fiery dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a noninflammable shield against the sparks of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The noninflammable coating on the wood made it as safe as a stone.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being ignited or burned.
meanings.sent1: The noninflammable liquid in the container couldn't be set on fire.
meanings.sent2: Firefighters wear noninflammable suits to protect themselves from flames.
meanings.sent3: The noninflammable cookies refused to bake in the hot oven.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as noninflammable as a diamond, unyielding to any heat.
meanings.sent5: The noninflammable barrier stood strong against the fiery threat.
